message: I hear a heavy thump overhead.
But I don't have any time to consider what it might be.
I grit my teeth as a sharp pain shoots up my twisted arm.
Somehow, the guy in the gas mask is there.
The blond man stands warily, putting some distance between himself and the new arrival.
I rub my aching arm and get up.

name: クリア
message: "The balcony. Master, is he a friend of yours?"
The sliding door is wide open.
And the lock has been sheared off.

name: クリア
message: "The door was closed, so I opened it."
The intruder glares at the man in the gas mask, then at me.
Hey, I have no idea what's going on either.

name: クリア
message: "Anyway, please don't bully Master. I won't allow it."
...Don't tell me he's actually getting angry.
He turns toward the man in the gas mask. I can feel the rage radiating from his back.
I have to stop them. Who's gonna clean up the mess?!
The door suddenly swings open and Koujaku bursts in.

name: 紅雀
message: "I sent you a message, remember? Then I saw some weirdo in a gas mask crawling in from the balcony."

name: 紅雀
message: "So I came as fast as I could."

name: 紅雀
message: "Looks like he brought a friend, too."
Koujaku glares at the two of them.

name: ノイズ
message: "As far as I'm concerned, you're both getting in my way."

name: クリア
message: "Our relationship could not yet be classified as friendly."

name: 紅雀
message: "Anyway, you two better beat it right now, before I throw you out."
He's not gonna take such obvious bait, right? I mean, there's no way... right?
My heart pounds as Koujaku cracks his knuckles.

name: 紅雀
message: "You have a smart mouth. Why don't I shut it for you permanently?!"
Koujaku makes a grab for the blond guy's collar.
He nimbly dodges Koujaku's attack, drops his hips and throws a punch.
Koujaku shifts just before the man's fist can make contact with his cheek, dodging the blow by a hair.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I said cut it out! This is my room!"
I don't know about the blond guy, but Koujaku's normally got patience in spades. When something does set him off, though, there's no stopping him.
Magazines and trash and knicknacks go flying, or are crushed underfoot as they scuffle.
I don't care about the other stuff! Just please, stay away from my computer!
That's when I hear someone storming up the stairs.
